title: Hello from Greece
content:
Hi everyone  
My name is Dimitris and i am a graphic designer.  
Greetings from Athens, Greece

 [‹ Who made helvetica neue?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232058/http:/typophile.com/node/37855 "Go to previous forum topic") [A Calligrapher's Journey: Society of Scribes lecture in NYC ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119232058/http:/typophile.com/node/37867 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mitridi_g

comments.content: Hi from oddly sunny New Haven, Connecticut.
And from oddly sunny Boston, too.

Interestingly, a cargo ship that I’m pretty sure is from Greece just went up the river past my place in Sault Ste. Marie, Canada, headed for somewhere on Lake Superor. I find myself critiquing the typography of the ship and company names as they go by.

It’s foggy here.
